    Getting active status

    mode_editEdit this page on Github

    #getStatus

    Description

    bpost.getStatus() will search for the currently active step in the delivery process of the package. It requires one passed parameter id and returns the data with the status: 'active' value in the API response.

    Spec

    Parameters Return type
    (id: String) Promise<Object>

    Usage

    import { getStatus } from 'bpost';

getStatus(`323267009691651472`).then(res => res);

    Output

    {
  knownProcessStep: "PICKED_UP_IN_POST_POINT_INTERNATIONAL",
  label: {
    detail: "inPostPoint",
    main: "pickedUp",
  },
  name: "delivered",
  status: "active",
}
